summary: WHILE DRIVING, THE VEHICLE  SHUT DOWN AND TO RESTARTED TEN TO TWENTY MINUTES LATER.    *NLM    BY THE TIME THE VEHICLE WAS PULLED OVER TO THE SLOW LANE, THE ACCELERATION STARTED AGAIN.  (AFTER A MINUTE OR TWO WITH NO POWER)   IT SPUTTERED BEFORE, WHILE CRUISING.  A CARB CLEANSER WAS PLACED IN.  AS THE VEHICLE APPROACHED 35 MPH OR 45 MPH, THE ACCELERATION RESTARTED AND THE CONSUMER WAS ABLE TO PULL BACK ONTO THE ROAD.   *SCC  *JB
